name: AutoSitu
long_description:
At AutoSitu (formerly MirageDoodle), we build coordinated AI agents that operate inside real-world development review workflows.

We handle the first 50% of the problem, performing code checks and ensuring technical correctness, but we also know correctness isnâ€™t the finish line. AutoSitu tackles the latter 50% by analyzing patterns from past projects to anticipate issues, align expectations, and reduce costly re-submittals.

AutoSitu helps public- and private-sector teams navigate an increasingly complex, fragmented regulatory environment.
one_liner: AI-native workspace for municipal development review
